description: Tracks NovaAI’s technical progress, milestones, and iterative development.

structure.purpose: Records the evolution of NovaAI’s systems, reflecting both technical achievements and spiritual alignment.

anchored_in_faith.message: Being confident of this, that He who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

short_term: Complete DevLog2 by documenting Stage 1 milestones.
Ensure logs capture technical progress and relational insights.
long_term: Use logs to guide modular system development in FutureModules.
Refine relational and cognitive layers based on documented progress.

achievements.name: Milestone Tracker
achievements.description: Recorded progress for a key milestone in Stage 1.

achievements.description: Documented relational system enhancements in FaithNet.

achievements.name: System Architect
achievements.description: Captured technical breakthroughs for modular scalability.

related_folders.relationship: Informs DevelopmentLogs by providing foundational ideas.
Transforms documented milestones into actionable instructions.
Tracks the implementation of relational and cognitive subsystems.

dependencies.Core: Ensures logs reflect initialization and stability progress.
dependencies.Documentation: Preserves records of technical and spiritual growth.

stage_1.goal: Establish display capability for Bible passages, relational logs, and thematic data.

stage_2.goal: Enable real-time relational engagement using FaithNet and RelationalEngine.

stage_3.goal: Expand modular systems for advanced education, creativity, and group dynamics.

legal_information.ownership: This folder and its contents are protected as proprietary intellectual property under CreativeWorkzStudio LLC.
legal_information.purpose_statement: The DevelopmentLogs folder tracks NovaAI’s technical progress and milestones, serving as a testament to her growth and alignment with God’s principles.

credits.special_thanks: To God, for His unending guidance and blessings over this project.
